subject: Shipping company - Delivery to Poland
description_text:
Hello,
Im wondering with which company do you guys usually ship the pedals to
Poland. Im interested in buying the simsonn plus X pedals, but because I
might not be home when the delivery guy arrives Im wondering which company
do you ship with, as some of them offer that you can redirect the parcel to
a parcel collection point and claim it any time I want (f.e. DPD or DHL). I
would highly appreciate a quick response.
Thanks in advance,
Oskar Tomala

conversations.body_text: Hi Oskar4531,    We will ship via DHL from Germany.
